ivardefs.name: activity_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan.  For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.

ivardefs.name: addresses_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the individual(s) or ogranization who is responsible for the content of the care plan.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

ivardefs.name: careTeam_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the original context in which this particular CarePlan was created.

ivardefs.name: definition_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the care plan should be conducted in accordance with.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A description of the scope and nature of the plan.

ivardefs.name: goal_
ivardefs.desc: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this care plan that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the care plan and where the care plan fits into the workflow chain.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

ivardefs.name: replaces_
ivardefs.desc: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include co-morbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: Human-friendly name for the CarePlan.
